Quarter: Quarter of the year for which the training budget is allocated (e.g. Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4)
Year: Year for which the training budget is allocated
Training Budget: Total amount allocated for employee training during the specified quarter and year
Department: Department or team within Lee's Market that the training budget is allocated for (e.g. Sales, Marketing, Operations)
Location: Geographic location within Lee's Market where the training budget is allocated (e.g. Region, Store, Warehouse)
